summary: Actress Brie Larson Says She Would Like To Do A Metroid Movie
title: Actress Brie Larson Says She Would Like To Do A Metroid Movie
body:
Actress Brie Larson Says She Would Like To Do A Metroid Movie

Respected actress Brie Larson has revealed that she is a super fan of the Metroid franchise. The actress, who has starred in films such as Scott Pilgrim vs. The World and Captain Marvel, dressed up as Zero Suit Samus on Halloween a couple of days back. She has recently said on Twitter that she would love to do a Metroid movie. Captain Marvel in released in cinemas on 8th March 2019.

View this…

summary: Brie Larson vuole interpretare Samus Aran in un film su Metroid
title: Brie Larson vuole interpretare Samus Aran in un film su Metroid
body:
Brie Larson vuole interpretare Samus Aran in un film su Metroid

La star di Capitan Marvel, Brie Larson, si è vestita come il personaggio di Metroid, Samus Aran, per Halloween, ed adesso l’intraprendente attrice ha detto di voler partecipare ad un film su Metroid.

La Larson Ha vinto un Oscar per il suo ritratto straziante di una donna tenuta in ostaggio in Room, ed ora sta per fare il suo ingresso nel mondo del cinema di massa con il ruolo di supereroe…

summary: Captain Marvel's Brie Larson Went as Metroid's Samus for Halloween!
title: Captain Marvel's Brie Larson Went as Metroid's Samus for Halloween!
body:
Captain Marvel’s Brie Larson Went as Metroid’s Samus for Halloween!

Captain Marvel star Brie Larson got into the Halloween spirit as she dressed up as Metroid’s Samus for Halloween.

Larson first showed off the costume in her Instagram story. You can her in the blue Zero Suit with Samus’ iconic blonde hair.

Larson would go on to show off a second photo of the suit as she posed on a bed with a friend who dressed up as Harry Potter.

View this post on Instagram

View On WordPress
